title: Trigger psst hooks with verbose bash commands
description: Run the verbose bash commands that match the test recipes. Verify psst fires PreToolUse hook and nudges toward the recipe. Check 'psst status' and 'psst history' for recorded events.

title: Pure functions: add/remove/check psst hooks
close_reason: Implemented Settings types, JSON codec, pure functions, and CLI commands (init/doctor/uninstall)

title: Add temporary test recipes to justfile
description: Add 2-3 test recipes to justfile that wrap verbose commands (e.g., 'test-build' wraps 'opam exec -- dune build'). These are temporary for testing psst hooks.
close_reason: Recipes already exist in justfile (build, test, clean, etc.) - no additions needed

title: CLI commands: init/doctor/uninstall (imperative shell)
close_reason: Implemented Settings types, JSON codec, pure functions, and CLI commands (init/doctor/uninstall)

title: Implement Settings JSON codec (boundary parsing)
close_reason: Implemented Settings types, JSON codec, pure functions, and CLI commands (init/doctor/uninstall)

title: Support global just recipes (~/.config/just)
description: Currently psst only looks for local justfiles (walking up from cwd). Should also check global recipes via 'just -g --dump --dump-format=json' and suggest 'just -g <recipe>' when a global recipe matches.

title: Homebrew formula and tap repository
close_reason: Created Homebrew tap (m-gris/homebrew-tap) with psst formula

title: Define Settings domain types (parse, don't validate)
close_reason: Implemented Settings types, JSON codec, pure functions, and CLI commands (init/doctor/uninstall)

title: Adversarial matching tests: sensitivity & specificity
description: Add negative tests to catch false positives and sensitivity guards to prevent regressions. Source plan: docs/plans/2025-02-04-adversarial-matching-tests.atomized.md
acceptance_criteria:
1. All negative tests pass (specificity)
2. All positive tests pass (sensitivity)
3. Manual verification with live hook
4. No false positives on common commands (ls, grep, docker build)
close_reason: All tests pass: 8 negative (specificity), 6 positive (sensitivity). Two bugs fixed in match.ml.

title: Setup test/test_match_negative.ml structure
description: Create the new test file with Alcotest boilerplate and add to test/dune
acceptance_criteria:
1. test/test_match_negative.ml exists with proper structure
2. test/dune updated with new test executable
3. just test runs without errors (empty test suite)
close_reason: Created test/test_match_negative.ml with boilerplate, added to test/dune, just test passes

title: Tests: reversed order false positive (BUG 1)
description: Write failing test proving 'test dune' incorrectly matches 'dune test' recipe due to order-agnostic Jaccard
acceptance_criteria: Test exists and FAILS, proving the bug
close_reason: Added failing tests that prove BUG 1: reversed order gives Jaccard=1.0

title: Impl: fix order-sensitivity in matching (BUG 1)
description: Fix match.ml so reversed token order does not produce false positive. Options: order-sensitive comparison, higher threshold, or weight first token
close_reason: Added first-token check in similarity function. Reversed order tests pass, positive tests unaffected.

title: Tests: prefix containment false positive (BUG 2)
description: Write failing test proving 'dune exec foo' incorrectly matches run recipe due to greedy prefix containment
acceptance_criteria: Test exists and FAILS, proving the bug
close_reason: Added tests: 'dune exec' matches incorrectly (0.9 via prefix), 'dune exec other' correctly rejects

title: Impl: fix prefix containment greediness (BUG 2)
description: Fix containment logic to require more significant overlap, not just first few tokens
close_reason: Added 50% token coverage requirement for prefix containment. All tests pass.

title: Tests: different tool false positive
description: Write tests proving 'docker build .', 'npm test', 'cargo build' do NOT match dune recipes
acceptance_criteria: Tests exist and pass (these should already work)
close_reason: Added tests: different_tool (4 tests, all pass), sensitivity guards (6 tests, all pass)

title: Tests: sensitivity guards (must still match)
description: Add tests ensuring legitimate matches still work: exact match, with boilerplate, with extra args, parameterized recipe
acceptance_criteria: All sensitivity tests pass before AND after fixes
close_reason: Added tests: different_tool (4 tests, all pass), sensitivity guards (6 tests, all pass)

title: Manual verification with live hook
description: Run reversed commands through the live hook, verify no false nudges
acceptance_criteria:
1. 'test dune' does not trigger nudge
2. 'docker build .' does not trigger nudge
3. 'dune build' still triggers nudge correctly
close_reason: Manual verification passed: reversed orders no longer nudge, legitimate commands still do

title: Cleanup test recipes from justfile
description: Remove the temporary test recipes added for testing. Verify justfile is back to original state.
